review.title: “Key Account Manager”
review.pros: Pros – Stated off with a clear cut objective and working around the state as well as city. Not in an office all day, but traveling around from account to account.
review.cons: Cons – Owners expect huge results in an unrealistic time frame. Very micro managing style. Company heads do not have a clue as to how to take care of problems or evaluations of their company. They have too many unsatisfied customers and expect a deep discount to bring around all of the business. No idea what customer relationship is all about.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Come up with a realistic business plan, find a professional location, get inventory correct and hold on th good people. Have a realistic gol in mind to increase sales and streamline the business.
